citation: Proclamation under the Fair Trading (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2004 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Fair Trading (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2004

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Fair Trading (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2004 fix 1 August 2004 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence

26 July 2004

W. J. E. Cox

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

Judy Jackson

Minister for Justice and Industrial Relations

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 July 2004

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
